data: ANES Insulin Subcutaneous Sliding Scale Post Operative (Module)
Not to be used concurrently with ANES Insulin Infusion Post Operative (Module) PowerPlan
On arrival to Post Anesthetic Care Unit (PACU) then q4h and PRN
When blood glucose below 4 mmol/L or above 14 mmol/L
For total daily insulin requirements less than 40 units/day from all sources
Sliding scale, subcutaneous, q4h, drug form: inj
For total daily insulin requirements 40 to 99 units/day from all sources
Sliding scale, subcutaneous, q4h, drug form: inj
For total daily insulin requirements 100 units/day or more from all sources
Sliding scale, subcutaneous, q4h, drug form: inj
